title: Presence and Awareness
body: When was the last time you felt truly present? What was happening around you?

title: Emotional Patterns
body: What emotion has been most present for you this week? What might it be teaching you?

title: Values Alignment
body: What's one thing you learned about yourself this week?

title: Connection and Belonging
body: When do you feel most connected to others? What creates that sense of belonging?

title: Inner Narrative
body: What story are you telling yourself about who you are right now? Is it serving you?

title: Growth Through Challenge
body: What challenge are you facing that might actually be shaping you for the better?

title: Purpose Exploration
body: If you could design your ideal day around what truly matters, what would it include?

title: Emotional Triggers
body: What triggers tension or stress in your life? What pattern lies beneath it?

title: Self-Compassion
body: How would you speak to a friend who felt the way you do right now?

title: Clarity and Direction
body: What decision or direction have you been avoiding? What's really holding you back?

title: Gratitude Practice
body: What are three small moments from this week that brought you peace or joy?

title: Life Alignment
body: Looking at your week, where did your actions align with your values? Where didn't they?
